verses.verse: הַמַּשָּׂא֙ <WH4853> The burden אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which חָזָ֔ה <WH2372> did see חֲבַקּ֖וּק <WH2265> which Habakkuk הַנָּבִֽיא׃ <WH5030> the prophet

עַד־ <WH5704> long אָ֧נָה <WH575> How יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> O LORD שִׁוַּ֖עְתִּי <WH7768> how long shall I cry וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> not תִשְׁמָ֑ע <WH8085> and thou wilt not hear אֶזְעַ֥ק <WH2199> [even] cry out אֵלֶ֛יךָ <WH413> to חָמָ֖ס <WH2555> unto thee [of] violence וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תוֹשִֽׁיעַ׃ <WH3467> and thou wilt not save

לָ֣מָּה <WH4100> Why תַרְאֵ֤נִי <WH7200> Why dost thou shew אָ֙וֶן֙ <WH205> me iniquity וְעָמָ֣ל <WH5999> grievance תַּבִּ֔יט <WH5027> and cause [me] to behold וְשֹׁ֥ד <WH7701> desolation וְחָמָ֖ס <WH2555> and violence לְנֶגְדִּ֑י <WH5048> are before וַיְהִ֧י <WH1961> exists רִ֦יב <WH7379> strife וּמָד֖וֹן <WH4066> and contention יִשָּֽׂא׃ <WH5375> [are] before me and there are [that] raise up

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> after that תָּפ֣וּג <WH6313> is slacked תּוֹרָ֔ה <WH8451> Therefore the law וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> go forth לָנֶ֖צַח <WH5331> doth never מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> and judgment כִּ֤י <WH3588> For רָשָׁע֙ <WH7563> for the wicked מַכְתִּ֣יר <WH3803> doth compass אֶת־ <WH853> הַצַּדִּ֔יק <WH6662> about the righteous עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֛ן <WH3651> after that יֵצֵ֥א <WH3318> proceedeth מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> judgment מְעֻקָּֽל׃ <WH6127> therefore wrong

רְא֤וּ <WH7200> Behold בַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> ye among the heathen וְֽהַבִּ֔יטוּ <WH5027> and regard וְהִֽתַּמְּה֖וּ <WH8539> and wonder תְּמָ֑הוּ <WH8539> marvellously כִּי־ <WH3588> Because פֹ֙עַל֙ <WH6467> a work פֹּעֵ֣ל <WH6466> for [I] will work בִּֽימֵיכֶ֔ם <WH3117> in your days לֹ֥א <WH3808> ye will not תַאֲמִ֖ינוּ <WH539> [which] ye will not believe כִּ֥י <WH3588> if יְסֻפָּֽר׃ <WH5608> though it be told

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> behold מֵקִים֙ <WH6965> For lo I raise up אֶת־ <WH853> הַכַּשְׂדִּ֔ים <WH3778> the Chaldeans הַגּ֖וֹי <WH1471> nation הַמַּ֣ר <WH4751> [that] bitter וְהַנִּמְהָ֑ר <WH4116> and hasty הַֽהוֹלֵךְ֙ <WH1980> which shall march לְמֶרְחֲבֵי־ <WH4800> through the breadth אֶ֔רֶץ <WH776> of the land לָרֶ֖שֶׁת <WH3423> to possess מִשְׁכָּנ֥וֹת <WH4908> the dwellingplaces לֹּא־ <WH3808> not לֽוֹ׃

אָיֹ֥ם <WH366> They [are] terrible וְנוֹרָ֖א <WH3372> and dreadful ה֑וּא <WH1931> he מִמֶּ֕נּוּ <WH4480> at מִשְׁפָּט֥וֹ <WH4941> their judgment וּשְׂאֵת֖וֹ <WH7613> and their dignity יֵצֵֽא׃ <WH3318> shall proceed

וְקַלּ֨וּ <WH7043> also are swifter מִנְּמֵרִ֜ים <WH5246> than the leopards סוּסָ֗יו <WH5483> Their horses וְחַדּוּ֙ <WH2300> and are more fierce מִזְּאֵ֣בֵי <WH2061> wolves עֶ֔רֶב <WH6153> than the evening וּפָ֖שׁוּ <WH6335> shall spread פָּֽרָשָׁ֑יו <WH6571> and their horsemen וּפָֽרָשָׁיו֙ <WH6571> themselves and their horsemen מֵרָח֣וֹק <WH7350> from far יָבֹ֔אוּ <WH935> shall come יָעֻ֕פוּ <WH5774> they shall fly כְּנֶ֖שֶׁר <WH5404> as the eagle חָ֥שׁ <WH2363> [that] hasteth לֶאֱכֽוֹל׃ <WH398> to eat

כֻּלֹּה֙ <WH3605> All לְחָמָ֣ס <WH2555> all for violence יָב֔וֹא <WH935> They shall come מְגַמַּ֥ת <WH4041> shall sup up פְּנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH6440> their faces קָדִ֑ימָה <WH6921> [as] the east wind וַיֶּאֱסֹ֥ף <WH622> and they shall gather כַּח֖וֹל <WH2344> as the sand שֶֽׁבִי׃ <WH7628> the captivity

וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> he בַּמְּלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> at the kings יִתְקַלָּ֔ס <WH7046> And they shall scoff וְרֹזְנִ֖ים <WH7336> and the princes מִשְׂחָ֣ק <WH4890> shall be a scorn ל֑וֹ ה֚וּא <WH1931> he לְכָל־ <WH3605> every מִבְצָ֣ר <WH4013> every strong hold יִשְׂחָ֔ק <WH7832> unto them they shall deride וַיִּצְבֹּ֥ר <WH6651> for they shall heap עָפָ֖ר <WH6083> dust וַֽיִּלְכְּדָֽהּ׃ <WH3920> and take

אָ֣ז <WH227> Then חָלַ֥ף <WH2498> change ר֛וּחַ <WH7307> Then shall [his] mind וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> and he shall pass over וְאָשֵׁ֑ם <WH816> and offend ז֥וּ <WH2098> [imputing] this כֹח֖וֹ <WH3581> his power לֵאלֹהֽוֹ׃ <WH430> angels

הֲל֧וֹא <WH3808> not אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you מִקֶּ֗דֶם <WH6924> [Art] thou not from everlasting יְהוָ֧ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהַ֛י <WH430> my God קְדֹשִׁ֖י <WH6918> my Holy לֹ֣א <WH3808> not נָמ֑וּת <WH4191> crying יְהוָה֙ <WH3069> God לְמִשְׁפָּ֣ט <WH4941> them for judgment שַׂמְתּ֔וֹ <WH7760> thou hast ordained וְצ֖וּר <WH6697> and O mighty God לְהוֹכִ֥יחַ <WH3198> them for correction יְסַדְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH3245> thou hast established

טְה֤וֹר <WH2890> pureness עֵינַ֙יִם֙ <WH5869> eyes מֵרְא֣וֹת <WH7200> than to behold רָ֔ע <WH7451> evil וְהַבִּ֥יט <WH5027> not look אֶל־ <WH413> on עָמָ֖ל <WH5999> on iniquity לֹ֣א <WH3808> and You תוּכָ֑ל <WH3201> and canst לָ֤מָּה <WH4100> Why תַבִּיט֙ <WH5027> wherefore lookest בּֽוֹגְדִ֔ים <WH898> thou upon them that deal treacherously תַּחֲרִ֕ישׁ <WH2790> [and] holdest thy tongue בְּבַלַּ֥ע <WH1104> devoureth רָשָׁ֖ע <WH7563> when the wicked צַדִּ֥יק <WH6662> [the man that is] more righteous מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> are too

וַתַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> And makest אָדָ֖ם <WH120> men כִּדְגֵ֣י <WH1709> as the fishes הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> of the sea כְּרֶ֖מֶשׂ <WH7431> as the creeping things לֹא־ <WH3808> without מֹשֵׁ֥ל <WH4910> [that have] no ruler בּֽוֹ׃

כֻּלֹּה֙ <WH3605> all בְּחַכָּ֣ה <WH2443> all of them with the angle הֵֽעֲלָ֔ה <WH5927> They take up יְגֹרֵ֣הוּ <WH1641> they catch בְחֶרְמ֔וֹ <WH2764> them in their net וְיַאַסְפֵ֖הוּ <WH622> and gather בְּמִכְמַרְתּ֑וֹ <WH4365> them in their drag עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that יִשְׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> therefore they rejoice וְיָגִֽיל׃ <WH1523> and are glad

עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> after that יְזַבֵּ֣חַ <WH2076> Therefore they sacrifice לְחֶרְמ֔וֹ <WH2764> unto their net וִֽיקַטֵּ֖ר <WH6999> and burn incense לְמִכְמַרְתּ֑וֹ <WH4365> unto their drag כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because בָהֵ֙מָּה֙ <WH1992> because by them שָׁמֵ֣ן <WH8082> [is] fat חֶלְק֔וֹ <WH2506> their portion וּמַאֲכָל֖וֹ <WH3978> and their meat בְּרִאָֽה׃ <WH1277> plenteous

הַ֥עַל <WH5921> and כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that יָרִ֣יק <WH7324> Shall they therefore empty חֶרְמ֑וֹ <WH2764> their net וְתָמִ֛יד <WH8548> continually לַהֲרֹ֥ג <WH2026> to slay גּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> nations לֹ֥א <WH3808> without יַחְמֽוֹל׃ <WH2550> and not spare ס
